snippet: The authorities say the train slammed into a parade float headed to an event honoring wounded veterans in Midland, Tex.
lead_paragraph: The authorities say the train slammed into a parade float headed to an event honoring wounded veterans in Midland, Tex.

headline.main: Texas: Four Are Killed and 17 Injured When Train Hits Veterans Parade Float
headline.print_headline: Texas: Four Are Killed and 17 Injured When Train Hits Veterans Parade Float
